Name: Chicken in Cream Sauce
Description: Chef John's Salvadoran-style chicken stewed in sour cream is comfort food at its best: succulent, flavorful, and filling, with just the right amount of heat.
Author: Chef John

Name: Pork Marsala
Description: Boneless pork loin chops are simmered in a Marsala wine, garlic, and herb sauce. This is easy enough for a weeknight, and impressive enough for company.
Author: MyPlate

Name: BBQ Oatmeal Meatloaf
Description: Breathe new life into an old meatloaf recipe with this sweet and tangy take on an American family classic.
Author: Jeffery Hunt

Name: Chef John's Homemade Chicken Noodle Soup
Description: This soul-warming soup is deliciously simple--just chicken and noodles. What makes it so good is the homemade roasted chicken stock.
Author: Chef John

Name: Best of the Best Blueberry Muffins
Description: Big Blueberry muffins with a crusty sugar topping. A recipe I got from my Grandma. The blueberries and the sweet batter are fabulous together. Favorites of all who have tried them. Quick and easy, made with few ingredients. Remember to use paper liners!
Author: AUNTLYNNIE

Name: Sexy Shrimp Scampi
Description: Butter and garlic make this simple but flavorful Scampi a big hit.
Author: TRAILINDAWG

Name: Chicken Thigh and Dumpling Stew
Description: A variety of vegetables come together in this richly textured dish. Go ahead and curl up with a comforting bowl of this creamy chicken and dumpling soup!
Author: averyfern

Name: Chocolate Chip Banana Bread II
Description: Rich and sweet with chocolate chips and walnuts, this banana bread is made with shortening and mayonnaise, making it very moist. This recipe makes 2 loaves.
Author: TI2GR

Name: Butter-Roasted Cauliflower
Description: Chef John's quick and easy recipe for butter-roasted cauliflower is an unusual and tremendously tasty way to enjoy cauliflower.
Author: Chef John

Name: Camarones a la Diabla (Mexican Deviled Prawns)
Description: These Mexican deviled prawns (camarones a la diabla) are cooked in a super spicy sauce made with ketchup and chipotle chiles in adobo.
Author: aidacontadora

Name: Pozole Rojo (Mexican Pork and Hominy Stew)
Description: Pozole rojo, a traditional Mexican pork and hominy stew with a red broth, is flavored with guajillo peppers and topped with lettuce and onion.
Author: Consuelo Aguilar

Name: Lobster and Grits with Chorizo
Description: Rich and decadent, this recipe raises the bar on shrimp and grits by substituting lobster and adding two kinds of cheese and chorizo.
Author: Houstonchef

Name: Cinnamon Pancakes
Description: Cinnamon in the batter adds an unexpected and delightful flavor twist to these easy fluffy pancakes that'll become a morning favorite.
Author: Christiana McCormick

Name: Grandma's Honey Bun Cake
Description: Yellow batter layered with cinnamon sugar is given the poke cake treatment with sweet vanilla icing to create this rich honey bun cake.
Author: Drea

Name: Avocado Pasta
Description: Whole grain penne pasta is tossed with a fresh herb and lime sauce and served with sprouts and avocado slices in this vegan-friendly dish.
Author: Heather: Healthy Vegan Recipes

Name: Korean Rice Cake (Tteok)
Description: This recipe for tteok, a Korean cake made with rice flour, is chock-full of mixed dried fruit and so easy a novice baker could make it.
Author: daidai

Name: North African Paella
Description: This North African twist on Spanish paella made with salmon, shrimp, mussels, and merguez sausage is a hearty stew served over couscous.
Author: 25 Peppers

Name: Easy Seaweed Salad
Description: This quick and easy Chinese-style seaweed salad is packed with complex flavors from a mix of vinegar, soy sauce, ginger, and sesame oil.
Author: Tony0314

Name: Old-Fashioned Elderberry Pie
Description: This old-fashioned double-crust pie made with a fresh elderberry-sour cream filling is sure to please the eye as well as the taste buds.
Author: Randy

Name: Elderberry Pie
Description: Fresh elderberries are mixed with sugar and cornstarch to make the filling for this pie that's easy to make with store-bought pie crusts.
Author: April Broxton

Name: Spinach Shrimp Salad with Miso Dressing
Description: Shrimp is arranged on a bed of spinach tossed in a sweet and savory miso dressing in this salad recipe inspired by Japanese flavors.
Author: FLIPAPPEAL

Name: Italian Stuffed Bread
Description: Bread dough stuffed with layers of mortadella, capicola ham, Genoa salami, and provolone cheese bakes up into a hearty Italian main dish.
Author: davey

Name: Gracie's Barmbrack
Description: Barmbrack, an easy bread made with dried fruit soaked in black tea is a delightful treat for tea time or breakfast served with coffee.
Author: graciethebaker

Name: Oatmeal Cinnamon Pancakes
Description: These oatmeal pancakes with cinnamon, applesauce, and brown sugar are a crowd-pleasing, quick and easy meal to make for breakfast or brunch.
Author: Anna Schreiber

Name: Kropsua (Finnish Pancake)
Description: Kropsua, a baked Finnish pancake, is quick and easy to make and very versatile; top with salt and pepper or your favorite pancake topping.
Author: DARBLEY13

Name: Blueberry Almond Pancakes
Description: Blueberries and almond extract are the star ingredients in these sweet and tart almond pancakes, a favorite for breakfast or brunch.
Author: ChefNYC

Name: Tteokguk (Korean Rice Cake Soup)
Description: Tteokguk, a Korean rice cake soup, includes thinly sliced steak, green onions, and sliced rice cakes creating a warm meal for cold days.
Author: mykoreaneats

Name: Squid Ink Pasta with Calamari
Description: Squid ink pasta is tossed in a creamy white wine sauce and calamari in this gourmet dinner that will impress your family and friends.
Author: Sarah Adamson

Name: Big Ray's Kielbasa Cabbage Skillet for a Crowd
Description: This Polish kielbasa sausage, cabbage, and potato skillet dinner is perfect for camping or an easy weeknight meal that feeds a crowd.
Author: bfr610
